Package suncertify.ui

Class Summary
ContractorTableModel Table model for contractors data retrieved from the database.
DataTableFrame Main frame of the graphic user interface.
ErrorHandler Applications error handler displaying an error message in a dialog.
UIController Class centralizing the logic of the database calls using a database connector provided.
